stanza.line: O thou my lovely boy who in thy powerpower
Dost hold Time fickle glass his fickle hourhour
Who hast by waning grown and therein showshow
Thy lovers withering as thy sweet self growgrow
As thou goest onwards still will pluck thee backback
She keeps thee to this purpose that her skillskill
May time disgrace and wretched minutes killkill
Yet fear her O thou minion of her pleasurepleasure
She may detain but not still keep her treasuretreasure
Her audit (though delayed) answered must bebe
And her quietus is to render theethee
